General.Name: Medicamen Biotech Limited
General.Description: Medicamen Biotech Limited researches, develops, manufactures, sells, and distributes pharmaceutical formulations and APIs in India. It offers a range of products, including tablets, such as non-beta lactum tablets; capsules comprising beta and non-beta lactum capsules; liquid and dry syrups; and ointments and creams. The company also provides lyohilized/dry powder injections, and oral solid and liquid products. Its products are used in various therapeutic areas, such as gastrointestinal, pain management, anti-infectives, pediatrics, dermatology, gynecology and rheumatology, diabetology, cardiology, oncology, and the central nervous system. The company was incorporated in 1993 and is based in New Delhi, India.
